about_the_game:
Isekai JanKen Hero - Digital Artbook: Character Introductions, Battle Illustrations at All 'Burst Clothing' Stages, 'Burst Clothing' and H-Scenes with Variations, Memorable Dialogues, Initial Character Designs, Background Art, and Cover Art Creation Process."

The digital artbook for "Isekai JanKen Hero" features an extensive collection of character illustrations, sketches, and scene artwork from the game, along with early character concepts that did not make it into the final release.

Content Highlights:
  • Character Introductions: Comprehensive profiles and background information for all the characters featured in the game.
  • Battle Illustrations at All 'Burst Clothing' Stages: Stunning artwork showcasing the characters in various 'Burst Clothing' states during intense battles.
  • Burst Clothing' and H-Scenes with Variations: Exploring the provocative 'Burst Clothing' moments and intimate H-scenes with multiple variations and outcomes.
  • Memorable Dialogues: A nostalgic look back at some of the most memorable and impactful dialogues from the game.
  • Initial Character Designs: Early concept art and designs that showcase the development process of the characters before their final iterations.
  • Background Art: Immersive and intricate artwork depicting the captivating world and environments of the game.
  • Cover Art Creation Process: An in-depth look into the creative process behind designing the captivating cover art for the game.

content_descriptors.notes: It contains female nudity and pornographic content, mild violence and other adult content. Please pay attention to it and make sure you are in a suitable place before watching, so as not to cause trouble for others.
